title: Is there any possible way of killing someone without physical pain? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course. That is done during an execution by lethal injection. When done right, the first medication will get the person asleep (exactly the same way you go asleep during a general anesthetic) and the other 2 medications will get your heart to stop beating. In a non-lethal execution scenario, carbon monoxide poisoning comes to mind as you just fall asleep and never wake up. Also, any major injury to the brainstem like a shotgun or large caliber bullet will take care of that.

Carbon monoxide poisoning while sleeping... You have to use sleeping pills for you to sleep but before that you should be in a sealed room. In it, turn the stove on. A person will die painlessly but... If he/she is lucky enough to survive, he/she will wake up with a very painful headache. I'm telling this to tell you it's possible but please do not kill anyone. =)
